abstract: Melissa Clark A Good Appetite column shares recipe for coconut pork stew with garam masala.
lead_paragraph: Coconut milk, garam masala and cayenne make for a luscious, fragrant pork stew.

headline.main: Pork Stew Gets a Chile Kick
